topicTitle: Who wants Ben to log on more?

posts.postText: Who wishes that Ben would log on the TTT server more?
Who cares. We do fine without him logging in, what difference would it possibly make.
it isnt his server its gash's so it realy doesnt matter. gash logs in every once in a while.
When school ends I'll have time to play. As of now, I cant play because I'm too busy.

Ben needs to give me moderator on forums. *cough* SOON *cough*
Ben needs to be on in general more often not just TTT

>> Ben needs to give me moderator on forums. *cough* SOON *cough* 
http://www.nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=2802 LOL

Its not along the lines we NEED him on, its more that it is fun as hell to play when he's on. We technically dont NEED any mods+ to log on if people actually post ban requests.

Yea, i went there :)

On the spot banning is more efficient than making a ban request, and sometimes you can't get the proper proof you need for the person to be banned.

Without mods/admins, who would accept those ban requests, anyways?

>> On the spot banning is more efficient than making a ban request, and sometimes you can't get the proper proof you need for the person to be banned.

Without mods/admins, who would accept those ban requests, anyways? 
Tl;dr anyway I have fun with crisis on TTT.....

Rotfl on the vote. xD
I just had to vote no. Lewlewl
Wen u dun wit skool?

Side note: My iPod just autocorrected "xd" to "xD"
Victory!!!
